mapper.select: SELECT utmlog.nid, plat.source_name as tender_utm_name, dept1.`name` as top_dept_name, dept2.`name` as second_dept_name, dept3.`name` as third_dept_name, admin.truename as operator, utmlog.update_time FROM ht_borrow_tender_utmlog utmlog LEFT JOIN hyjf_user.ht_utm_plat plat ON utmlog.tender_utm_id = plat.source_id LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_department dept1 ON utmlog.top_dept_id = dept1.id LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_department dept2 ON utmlog.second_dept_id = dept2.id LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_department dept3 ON utmlog.third_dept_id = dept3.id LEFT JOIN hyjf_config.ht_admin admin ON utmlog.operator = admin.id where nid = #{nid}
